short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translates LinkedIn posts into more human language

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cut right through the fluff and focus on what people are ACTUALLY saying on LinkedIn.

After installing, just head to LinkedIn, enable the extension, input your OpenAI API key and hit the "translate to human" button and watch the subtext become explicit.

It's the most fun you'll ever have on LinkedIn. Guaranteed.
